blog.name: jorgesantiagojr
blog.title: The Comic Art of Jorge Santiago Jr.
blog.description: A professional comic artist with crazy spirals for hair.

summary: Made some progress on that Percival drawing I posted a while back. Soon I’ll try to add ink wash for shadow and details....
body: Made some progress on that Percival drawing I posted a while back. Soon I’ll try to add ink wash for shadow and details. Percival is one of the characters in Critical Role campaign 1, and is essentially Batman if he got to have closure. These inks are with a Pentel color brush on Stillman and Birn alpha sketchbook paper.

reblog.comment: Made some progress on that Percival drawing I posted a while back. Soon I’ll try to add ink wash for shadow and details. Percival is one of the characters in Critical Role campaign 1, and is essentially Batman if he got to have closure. These inks are with a Pentel color brush on Stillman and Birn alpha sketchbook paper.

blog.description: Writing/fandom blog created for the purpose of having something to link to from Ao3.

title:
SeveralSmallHedgehogs
        |
        Archive of Our Own
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
The truck was definitely done for. There was still plenty of gas in the tank, but the engine simply refused turn over.

“Well,” said Caleb, sitting back in his seat after his sixth time trying to restart the car, “I think we are going to have to walk from here.” He pulled the keys out of the ignition and put them in his pocket, where the rattling metal was muffled.

Nott opened the passengers’ side door and started to climb out. “Should we take the keys?”

“Maybe,” Caleb said. “One of Beau’s people may be able to fix this thing up and use it.”

“All right.” Nott shut her car door. “How far is it?”

“Not too far. Just through the woods here.”

posted the link to the wrong blog… again

Last chapter of my The Last of Us fic!

summary: with your patient face and wandering eye // don't hold this war inside || caleb/jester || chapter two
title: with your patient face and wandering eye // don't hold this war inside || caleb/jester || chapter two
body:
“By the time Jester has risen, dressed, and washed her face with water from the basin on her bedside table, the sky has brightened into true dawn, and the chill of night has lessened by a degree or two, though winter is still nipping at the air as she steps outside. She wraps her cloak a little tighter around herself against the breeze and pretends that’s why she took her time getting ready — she was just waiting for it to warm up a little. She’s not nervous, or terrified.”

Caleb casts a spell, and Jester makes a promise.

part eight of out here in the dark

rating: m
chapters: 2/3
words: 6,238

characters: Jester Lavorre, Caleb Widogast, Beau, Nott, Fjord, Yasha, Caduceus Clay, Eskil Ryndarien, Original Character, The Traveler

tags: angst, fluff, romance, discussion of trauma, discussion of torture, discussion of ptsd, discussion of suicide, body horror, gratuitous and likely incorrect use of magic, once again christine perverts the rules of d&d, please do not hate me

blog.title: make a better world than ours, kal
blog.description:
My name is Hope, 26 She/Her, this is my hodge-podge blog of things I care about. This is for the most part a fandom blog, I write fics, post fanart and make edits. I try to tag most things these days if you use tumblr Savior.

People who talk shit about Zack Snyder/DCEU get blocked

Aries. Gryffindor. Fandom blog. Batman v Superman Defense Squad. Zack Snyder stan. DC Positivity. DCEU/DC comics blog. Dungeons and Dragons, Critical Role, newly getting into TAZ. Legends of Tomorrow. Netflix's Daredevil. Nightwing. Batfamily. Man of Steel Positivity/DCEU positivity. Brooklyn Nine-Nine. Disney. Dreamworks. Writing. Doctor Who. The Gifted. Clarice Fong/Blink appreciation. Harry Potter. Books. Fashion. Text post junk. Social Justice. Feminism. Music. Fall Out Boy.

tags: its crazy how shit works out
summary: Rewatching the live show where they first meet Avantika and Beau literally tells her “by the way we’re not just some dumbass...
body:
Rewatching the live show where they first meet Avantika and Beau literally tells her “by the way we’re not just some dumbass crew Fjord hired. We totally killed all your guys.” And Notts like “WE’RE LOCO WE DONT EVEN KNOW WHT WE DID IT!”

They told her guys.

They straight up told her how this relationship would end for her and Avantika was so focused on her Destiny and on Fjord that she just ignored it.

reblog.comment:

blog.name: bixbiboom
blog.title: I myself am also Enchanter Pumat Sol
blog.description:
Bixbi, older than you.

Fat queer of indeterminate origin.

Possibly a lesser demon.

Hellenist serving Hestia, Hermes and Chiron.

Critical Role has taken over my life and my blog.

Taliesin Jaffe is my boyfriend.

I love you.

#eyesnevershut
